actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

official_title: A bill to settle claims relating to certain allotted Indian lands of the White Earth Indian Reservation, quiet titles to such lands, and for other purposes.
short_title: White Earth Allotment Claims Settlement Act of 1983

summary.text: White Earth Allotment Claims Settlement Act of 1983 - Provides for the settlement of claims relating to trust allotments of land granted to Chippewa Indians of the White Earth Reservation, Minnesota, and for the quiet of title to such lands.

titles.title: White Earth Allotment Claims Settlement Act of 1983
A bill to settle claims relating to certain allotted Indian lands of the White Earth Indian Reservation, quiet titles to such lands, and for other purposes.
